DIPY is an international software project
which gathers scientists from all over the
world to work on the same codebase.
With this vision DIPY has assembled a
No specific direction is enforced apart
We want you! Fork our project at

let's organize a school for learning DIPY
Because of its open license DIPY is great
for being used by smaller or larger
companies. If DIPY is useful to you we
would love to hear back from you.

DIPY although a relatively new software
project has an astounding number of
functionalities. Here are some of the most
